channel.title: [Help] Kill Owner to wield the item [Help]
channel.description:
Well, ive seen one source with an item u can only wield if u kill the owner first, how do i add that
if theres a tut for this plz post the link if not plz tell me how to add it :D?

item.title: [Help] Kill Owner to wield the item [Help]
item.dc:creator: @pistolse pistolse
item.description:
@pistolse wrote:

and if i am the owner will it still say: u have to kill the owner to wear this item?

Read full topic
item.source: [Help] Kill Owner to wield the item [Help]

item.title: [Help] Kill Owner to wield the item [Help]
item.dc:creator: @J_a_y J a y
item.description:
@J_a_y wrote:

Something like…

if(wearID == ITEMID && killedOwner == 0){ sendMessage("You must have owned the Owner to wear this item..."); return false; }

?

Read full topic
item.source: [Help] Kill Owner to wield the item [Help]

item.title: [Help] Kill Owner to wield the item [Help]
item.dc:creator: @_mpire £mpire
item.description:
@_mpire wrote:

Make up a boolean like

public boolean ownerowned = false;

then something like

if(playername.EqualsIgnoreCase.(“owner”) {
GetKillerId
ownerowned = true;
additem(“ItemId,ItemAmount”);

Something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] Kill Owner to wield the item [Help]
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

[quote=“pistolse, post:3, topic:234518”]yeah but when u trying to use it how can i make it say

“u need to kill the owner to wield this item”[/quote]

Do a sendmessage; sendmessage; You need to kill the server owner to wield this item.

You make up the function yourself
